abstract: Iowa Republican party leader Sam Clovis, once harshly critical of Donald Trump's presidential campaign, is now joining it; party officials worry move, while neither illegal nor unheard of, could further harm credibility of state's influential presidential primary caucuses in wake of recent 'pay-for-play' scandal surrounding Ron Paul's 2011 campaign.
lead_paragraph: The defection of Rick Perry’s top campaign aide in the state to Donald Trump “sends a perception that we’re pay-for-play,” a Republican official said.

headline.main: Defection of Perry Aide to Trump Camp Has Iowans Fearing for Image
headline.print_headline: Defection to Trump Has Iowans Fearing for Image

snippet: The defection of Rick Perry’s top campaign aide in the state to Donald Trump “sends a perception that we’re pay-for-play,” a Republican official said.
